Id:

value: ChalmydiaScreening_Common

Version:
2.0.0

Title:
Chlamydia Screening Common Library

Type:
code: logic-library

Status:
draft

Description:
Common Logic for adherence to Chlamydia Screening guidelines

text: Chlamydia Screening

Related:

reference: Library/library-quick-model-definition

Data Requirements:

type: Condition

code filter:
path: code
valueset: Other Female Reproductive Conditions

Content:

type: text/cql

url: library-example-content.cql

value.description: Common Logic for adherence to Chlamydia Screening guidelines

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: composed-of
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: content-type
parameters.description: The type of content in the library (e.g. text/cql)

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the library

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the library

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the library

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The library publication date

parameters.name: depends-on
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the library

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the library is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the library

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the library

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the library

parameters.name: predecessor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the library

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the library

parameters.name: successor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the library

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topics associated with the module

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the library (e.g. logic-library, model-definition, asset-collection, module-definition)

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the library

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the library

resource.title: Chlamydia Screening Common Library
resource.description: Common Logic for adherence to Chlamydia Screening guidelines
